data.name: pageview_recorder
data.marketing: Logs page views. Does not provide any way of viewing output, instead this plugin replaces functionality that was removed from default installations of Jomres as some older users requested the functionality be restored.
data.description: Logs page views. Does not provide any way of viewing output, instead this plugin replaces functionality that was removed from default installations of Jomres as some older users requested the functionality be restored.
data.change_log: v1.1 Modified to not trigger on ajax calls. v1.2 Added settings to enable/disable functionality in the Debugging tab of Site Config. v1.3 French language file added. v1.4 Language files updated v1.5 Fixed notices v1.6 Documentation updated.
data.author: Vince Wooll
